title: Ep 289 Frankly Speaking: Model Portfolios, Freud, Disney and Apple
itunes:title: Frankly Speaking: Model Portfolios, Freud, Disney and Apple
description:
We start off today with a question from Steve about model portfolios. If you’re not sure exactly what that is, listen here.
Mark asks Frank first about Disney and secondly if he could talk about “permabears”.
Paul asks Frank about large cap miners and could some of them be taken over.
Please send in your questions 
    Plus, Franks brand new website is live at  and his new newsletter Disrupters and Dominators has launched.  to learn more about it.
